name: Blocked in the 7th Space
description:
A colored bullet-hell game where you incarn a spaceship ! You've been trapped by a gigantic robot-spaceship, destroy it to regain your freedom !

Instructions

  • Avoid the bullets 
  • Shoot the bullets with the same color than your gun 
  • Take the bombs to destroy the robot-spaceship 
  • Upgrade and/or change spaceship !

Keys 

  • Move : Z,Q,S,D or arrows 
  • Switch color : A, E
  • Shop/Pause menu: Esc

Credits

Enzo Medina - Developper, Game Designer

Arthur Toder - Artist

Thalia Meignan - Music, sounds effects 

We did not make everything, here is what we used :

Spaceships, Backgrounds, Space GUI, Font Space
